---
title: "üîí Private Comments"
description: "Private Comments allow you to exchange direct, private messages with another person inside a dot. These conversations are visible only to you and the selected user, making them perfect for sharing sensitive feedback, clarifying details one-on-one, or coordinating quietly without interrupting the main team discussion. This option ensures privacy, focus, and a clean separation between public and personal communication."

## üìù How to use Private Comments

üßæ Navigate to the dot where you want to start or view a private conversation.

üë§ Open the Comments panel and choose the person you want to message privately.

üîÑ Before sending the message, click the Private Comment icon to switch from public comments to a private comment.

üîí Type your message and press Enter. Only you and the selected person will be able to see this conversation.

üí¨ Exchange replies back and forth just like a normal comment thread ‚Äî but fully private.

</div>


### üí° Tips

* Use private comments to share confidential feedback or context meant for one person.

* Ideal for reviewing drafts, giving early opinions, or clarifying misunderstandings privately.

* You can maintain multiple private threads with different users inside the same dot.
